document.full_text: a school warden was charged thursday with the murder of a 7-year-old boy accused of stealing about $2.30 from a classmate, a government lawyer said.
document.title: asia: malaysia: school official charged in student's killing
lines_and_colors: a school warden was charged thursday with the murder of a 7-year-old boy accused of stealing about $2.30 from a classmate, a government lawyer said.
